review: It works as expected. I use it mostly for HBOgo, ESPN, Netflix, and now Showtime Anytime. It's easy to cast from your phone on to the TV.
author: recentcollegegrad

review: My Belkin model isn't supported by Google. Now w/Amazon Prime & (sometimes) Netflix I don't need it. Make sure you do you research b4 you buy.
author: Carol Dowdy

review: Works great, love streaming twitch and YouTube
author: Jonathan

review: Simple. Easy to use. Easier to setup. The best feature, however is, it has a GREAT picture!
author: Dorwin Sanders

review: It has an excelent presentation. However, its not so fast when you change LAN. Lasted versions dont work fine in several mobile devices, overall a mirror cast.
author: Cliente de Amazon

review: This is an amazing streaming product, however I took a star off because of the overheating issue. Even when it isn't on or streaming anything, it still overheats and gets too hot too touch some times.
author: Jarod Holley "virtualprodigy9"

review: I don't want to load another browser just to get functionality.  I thought this was same as MiraCast, guess not.  Get MiraCast, resort and standard.
author: Kenneth A. Argo
